channel.title: Animation command[PI]

item.title: Animation command[PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“buzzern, post:1, topic:394106”]okey i’ve added a command.
but when i type ::diemofodie ingame it only does animation 2304…
i use Project insanity.
here is the command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("diemofodie")) { c.startAnimation(3170); c.startAnimation(2304); }

but it only does the last one…
i’ve also tried this but then i get an error when i compile.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("diemofodie")) { c.startAnimation(3170); c2.startAnimation(2304); }

PLEASE HELP! :S[/quote]Uh, you can’t make it do 2 animations? just pick one, lol. Let’s not get greedy.

Read full topic

item.title: Animation command[PI]
item.dc:creator: @buzzern buzzern
item.description:
@buzzern wrote:

okey i’ve added a command.
but when i type ::diemofodie ingame it only does animation 2304…
i use Project insanity.
here is the command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("diemofodie")) { c.startAnimation(3170); c.startAnimation(2304); }

but it only does the last one…
i’ve also tried this but then i get an error when i compile.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("diemofodie")) { c.startAnimation(3170); c2.startAnimation(2304); }

PLEASE HELP! :S
